name: OHHH SHIIIIIIIIIIII - Broken, don't bother with it :<
name_original: OHHH SHIIIIIIIIIIII - Broken, don't bother with it :<
description:
Note: This is broken, so don't bother with it. I may revisit it at a later date when I have time.

This was an attempt to investigate limitations on input, ie, you can only move in the opposite direction from the one in which you are currently moving. Unfortunately, I didn't really have any time to work on it as I was moving house, so have a not-really-that-fun 'game' for posterity.

The art style was going for '90s FMV, but it came out more as just Supermegablurrovision. :|

Frankly, the best bit is the music, which I did in LMMS in about 2 hours. Will link to SoundCloud in a bit.

CONTROLS

Left / A: Move left

Right / D: Move right

You can also use the left analogue stick on a gamepad, but you still need a mouse to click the play button. :)

EDIT: Unity has decided to re-import everything, so not gonna get a demo up for this before the deadline. :| Will update when it's (finally) posted. Should've done this yesterday.

EDIT @ 19:40 CEST: Looks like the background shaders to draw the animated starfields aren't working in the WebGL build, hence the purple background. Basically, just don't play this, it's broken, and I don't have time to fix it at the moment. :/
